knight.name: Knight
knight.description:
The quintessential knight, unmatched in melee combat. Armed with the most knightly weapon, the pollaxe, and equipped with plate armor, the knight is a force to be feared.

Recommended Proficiencies: Polearms, Brawling.

Difficulty: Very Easy

noble.name: Noble
noble.description:
The noble comes from a high class background. They carry their longsword as a sign of status.

Recommended Proficiencies: Longswords, Brawling.

Difficulty: Hard

soldier.name: Soldier
soldier.description:
The soldier is a veteran of battlefields across the continent. Armed with a halberd, the soldier relies on their reach and striking power to eliminate enemies.

Recommended Proficiencies: Polearms, Swords, Brawling.

Difficult: Easy

ranger.name: Ranger
ranger.description:
The ranger is a soldier who prefers to strike from range, with a bow. They are strong from years of practice with a warbow.

Recommended Proficiencies: Bow, swords

arquebusier.name: Arquebusier
arquebusier.description: The arquebusier is a mercenary armed with a gun meant to be fired from a stand. Firearms technology makes the arquebusier a dangerous foe.

doppelsoldner.name: Doppelsoldner
doppelsoldner.description:
Doppelsoldner means double-pay mercenary. Armed with the gigantic zweihander, they take the riskiest jobs possible for twice the pay. They are often employed as bodyguards.

Recommended Proficiencies: Longswords
